title: Rudy Giuliani, Michael B. Jordan, ATL Water Boys, NFL Draft and more.
itunes:title: Rudy Giuliani, Michael B. Jordan, ATL Water Boys, NFL Draft and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve is back in America and he maybe doing the show under protest and duress. The Chief Love Officer tells a lady to not let her family's opinion of her man ruin what she has with him. Michael B. Jordan shuts down Superman rumors. Police in Atlanta are deciding whether the ATL water boys should stay or go. The crew play a little game of trust. Junior covers the highs and lows of the NFL Draft last night. The FBI raids former NYC mayor Rudy Giuliani's apartment and he is in trouble. There is a poll out there that says that nearly 30% of Americans are interested in having an open relationship. Steve wraps up the show, week and month talking about having no dietary restrictions and his need to take 4 days off for rest.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
